about_the_game:
HUNT FOR CLUES. CHOOSE YOUR PATH. SOLVE THE MURDER.


"Why Did The Chicken Cross The Road?"


No Stone Unturned is an Indie Noir Detective Comedy-Adventure game following the heartbreaking story of a Squirrel set on becoming the world's greatest detective. Hunting for clues both to solve the horrific crimes of a quaint countryside town, and to find the truth about your own entry to this world.

Solve Cases!


In No Stone Unturned, you can search for clues, interrogate suspects and finally, crack the case! Make friends (or enemies) with a big range of townsfolk ranging from complete psychopaths to innocent and lovable grandmothers. All with their own dark secrets to unpack and cases to solve.

Impact The World!


Take control of your story through vital choices that allow the power of life and death, who will you save? Who will you punish? And why? We pack every moment of No Stone Unturned with fun, even making a task as simple as doing the dishes a demonic dance of dread.

Learn the Truth!


Experience a truly rich story filled with both complex lore and action-filled narrative experiences! With over 15 townsfolk to interact with, all with secrets and problems of their own for you to solve.

Interested in Following the Game's Progress?


Follow us @wisemonkeyltd on all socials!

content_descriptors.notes: Our demo will show the death and dead body of a chicken character in our game.
